name: Devil's Advocate
description:
Death comes for all. In the modern world life is becoming harder to take. Yet there are lives you must take but nurses and doctors are trying to stop you.  As death you must cast a series of illnesses on patients in hospitals. Your 1 will cast an infection your most powerful option but with the longest cooldown. Your 2 will cast a blood clot this will range its damage based upon where the clot hits. Your 3 is a Stroke quick to damage quick to get healed off.

Move with WASD
